thread.section_title: Vermont Farm Table Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vermont Farm Table | vermontfarmtable.com
thread.title: Candice Marcus
thread.title_full: Vermont Farm Table reviewed by Candice Marcus

author: Candice Marcus
title: Candice Marcus
text: I had a wonderful experience from start to finish with Vermont Farm Table. I went with a custom finish and size, and when you choose to do that you want to make sure you get it right! Kate helped me all the way and now seeing it in person -it's amazing. My family and I will happily be having many good meals here!
